title: Allison Janney talks Oscar nod at luncheon
text:
Allison Janney talks Oscar nod at luncheon 1:28pm GMT - 01:22 
Janney is ''overwhelmed'' to be nominated for her role as the hard-driving mother of disgraced figure skater Tonya Harding in ''I, Tonya''. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Janney is "overwhelmed" to be nominated for her role as the hard-driving mother of disgraced figure skater Tonya Harding in "I, Tonya". Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2BILJDp
